name: Paper Nest
address: 3rd Floor, 19 Chan Cam Street, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in the Hoan Kiem district in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment is 200 metres from St. Joseph Cathedral. Guests benefit from balcony and a terrace. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

Towels and bed linen are available in this apartment.

Ngoc Son Temple is 500 metres from Paper Nest, while Hoan Kiem Lake is 500 metres from the property. Noi Bai International Airport is 21 km away.
